column6: leave more space in front of their vehicle.
column10: increase their speed to avoid hydroplaning.

column2: 9. When driving through a curve, you should:

column8: turn on the radio to keep you awake.

column2: 11. When drivers come to this sign, they must:

column2: 13. To check your blind spot before changing lanes:

column2: 14. If you are pulled over by law enforcement, you should:

column2: 15. When driving in fog, drivers should:
column8: use low beam headlights to better illuminate the road ahead.

column6: within 200 feet of an elementary school.
